channel.title: Setup on Sanjeev
channel.description: Recent content in Setup on Sanjeev

item.title: Install Arch Linux
item.description: It’s been a long time since I have been using Arch Linux and loving it since because of its flexibility. In the mean time, I have installed the same OS for many times because I tried new things and crashed a lot of installed things. Literally, thinking about the time to repair, I just re-installed the OS. It just feels quick and easy to clear out all your garbage. However, it’s a pain to setup all those applications and configuration.
